title: One Piece Episodes 495-499: Piss Off Ghost
author: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast
description: The flashback continues! Luffy, Ace, and Sabo continue to get to know each other and wreak all the havoc possible. A celestial dragon is inbound to pay a visit to Goa Kingdom. The Going Merry crew discusses the emotional moments and character development in these episodes.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through the end of the Post-War Arc

engagement.platform_specific: Available on Spotify and Apple Podcasts

title: Anime Review: One Piece 494-496
author: populationgo
description: A review of One Piece episodes 494-496, covering the early flashback arc showing Luffy, Ace, and Sabo's childhood and the torture scene with Porchemy.

title: I Won't Run - Ace's Desperate Rescue Operation
author: Crunchyroll
description: Official streaming of Episode 495 on Crunchyroll. Ace and Sabo race to rescue Luffy from the clutches of a murderous gang of pirates. Sabo wants to grab Luffy and make a break for it, but Ace refuses to back down from a fight – even when he's outnumbered!

title: One Piece – Post War Arc (Episodes 493 – 516) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Post-War Arc including Episode 495, analyzing the flashback episodes showing Luffy, Ace, and Sabo's childhood and the emotional impact of the arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for entire Post-War Arc

title: THESE 3 ARE THE BEST! - One Piece Episode 495 + 496 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Various Reactors
description: Reaction and review video covering episodes 495 and 496, focusing on the emotional moments between Luffy, Ace, and Sabo and the rescue scene.

title: Episode 495 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 495 including plot summary, character appearances, trivia, and production details.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Wiki may contain spoilers from later episodes in cross-references
